code: import React from'react';import{ArrowUp,ArrowDown,Minus}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StatCard=_ref=>{let{title,value,icon:Icon,trend,color='lime'}=_ref;const colors={lime:'text-lime-400 bg-lime-400/10',green:'text-green-400 bg-green-400/10',red:'text-red-400 bg-red-400/10',blue:'text-blue-400 bg-blue-400/10',yellow:'text-yellow-400 bg-yellow-400/10'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rounded-xl border border-slate-800 bg-slate-900 p-6 shadow-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm font-medium text-slate-400",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mt-2 text-3xl font-bold text-slate-100",children:value})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rounded-lg p-3 ".concat(colors[color]),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{className:"h-6 w-6"})})]}),trend&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-4 flex items-center text-sm",children:[trend>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArrowUp,{className:"mr-1 h-4 w-4 text-green-400"}):trend<0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArrowDown,{className:"mr-1 h-4 w-4 text-red-400"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Minus,{className:"mr-1 h-4 w-4 text-slate-400"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:trend>0?'text-green-400':trend<0?'text-red-400':'text-slate-400',children:[Math.abs(trend),"%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"ml-2 text-slate-500",children:"vs mes anterior"})]})]});};export default StatCard;
